title: Home Office Simulator - Ayame Life Sim

trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have successfully obtained all the trophies in the game. You have proven yourself as the ultimate master of the Home Office Simulator, accomplishing every challenge, reaching remarkable milestones, and showcasing unparalleled expertise in managing your virtual workspace. Your dedication, strategic thinking, and attention to detail have made you a true virtuoso of the home office realm
Upgrade the Black Cat decoration to its maximum level. Embrace your feline companion and reach the pinnacle of cat-related office decorations by fully upgrading the Black Cat
Accumulate a total of 1 million money. Show your financial prowess and amass a significant fortune through successful business endeavors and office management
Upgrade the Falling Mug decoration to its maximum level. Witness the remarkable feat of a mug that defies gravity and achieves its highest potential as an office decoration
Upgrade the Water feature to its maximum level. Transform your office into an oasis of tranquility by optimizing the Water feature to its fullest capacity
Upgrade the Router to its maximum level. Become a master of connectivity and ensure seamless network access throughout your home office by fully upgrading the Router
Upgrade the Tablet to its maximum level. Harness the power of modern technology by optimizing your Tablet to its fullest potential, making it an essential tool in your home office
Upgrade the Switch device to its maximum level. Explore the world of gaming and entertainment by fully optimizing the Switch to provide the ultimate gaming experience in your home office
Upgrade the Spilling Coffee decoration to its maximum level. Embrace the chaotic nature of spilled coffee and transform it into a remarkable artistic expression within your home office
Upgrade the Falling Books decoration to its maximum level. Create a visually stunning spectacle by fully upgrading the Falling Books, showcasing your love for knowledge and literature
Upgrade the Phone device to its maximum level. Stay connected and organized with the latest advancements in telecommunication technology by fully upgrading your Phone in the home office
Upgrade the Coffee Machine to its maximum level. Become the master of brewing and satisfy your caffeine cravings with the perfectly optimized Coffee Machine in your home office
Upgrade the Washing Machine to its maximum level. Conquer the never-ending pile of laundry with the state-of-the-art Washing Machine, making laundry a breeze in your home office
Upgrade the Fridge to its maximum level. Keep your refreshments and snacks chilled to perfection with the fully upgraded Fridge, ensuring maximum comfort and convenience in your home office
Upgrade the Headset to its maximum level. Dive into a world of immersive sound and crystal-clear communication by optimizing your Headset to deliver the ultimate audio experience in your home office
Upgrade the Flies repellent to its maximum level. Banish pesky flies and create a serene work environment by fully optimizing the Flies repellent in your home office
Upgrade the PC to its maximum level. Harness the power of cutting-edge technology and unleash your productivity by fully optimizing the PC in your home office
Upgrade all studies to level 100. Showcase your dedication to knowledge and learning by reaching the pinnacle of academic trophy in your home office
Upgrade the Gray Cat decoration to its maximum level. Develop a special bond with the Gray Cat and elevate your office ambiance by fully upgrading this charming feline decoration
Purchase the last available apartment. Settle into the perfect home office environment by acquiring the final apartment option, creating the ultimate space for work and relaxation
Accumulate a total of 1 billion money. Showcase your remarkable financial success and join the ranks of the elite by amassing a substantial fortune of 1 billion money in your home office simulation
